titleStmt.title: A Further account of the proceedings against the rebels in Scotland, since the arrival of His Grace the Duke of Monmouth communicated in a letter to a person of quality from Edenburgh, dated the 19th of this instant June, 1679 : with the substance of a new declaration, published by the rebels.

A Further account of the proceedings against the rebels in Scotland, since the arrival of His Grace the Duke of Monmouth communicated in a letter to a person of quality from Edenburgh, dated the 19th of this instant June, 1679 : with the substance of a new declaration, published by the rebels.

notesStmt.note: Imprint suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
